Class LinkedConnectionDataset

A profile represents the preferences of the traveller. Which PT-operators does he want to take? Which doesn't he? How fast does he walk? All these are stored here

| Improve this Doc View Source

AsTransitDb()

Initialized a new transitDB which will automatically load data from this linked connection dataset whenever needed. Some progress information will be written to 'Log.Information'.

If you need more control, use 'new TransitDB(someCustomUpdateFunction)'

Declaration
